ivardefs.name: altId
ivardefs.desc: Alternative agent Identifier. For a human, this should be a user identifier text string from authentication system. This identifier would be one known to a common authentication system (e.g. single sign-on), if available.

ivardefs.name: media
ivardefs.desc: Type of media involved. Used when the event is about exporting/importing onto media.

ivardefs.name: network
ivardefs.desc: Logical network location for application activity, if the activity has a network location.

ivardefs.name: policy_
ivardefs.desc: The policy or plan that authorized the activity being recorded. Typically, a single activity may have multiple applicable policies, such as patient consent, guarantor funding, etc. The policy would also indicate the security token used.

ivardefs.name: purposeOfUse_
ivardefs.desc: The reason (purpose of use), specific to this agent, that was used during the event being recorded.

ivardefs.name: requestor
ivardefs.desc: Indicator that the user is or is not the requestor, or initiator, for the event being audited.

ivardefs.name: role_
ivardefs.desc: The security role that the user was acting under, that come from local codes defined by the access control security system (e.g. RBAC, ABAC) used in the local context.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Specification of the participation type the user plays when performing the event.

ivardefs.name: who
ivardefs.desc: Reference to who this agent is that was involved in the event.

properties.desc: An actor taking an active role in the event or activity that is logged.
